title: Historical Controversies and Revisionism - Collection 6
description:
Historical Controversies and Revisionism - Collection 6:

We have 28 files here:

-  Bradley - The China Mirage; the Hidden History of American Disaster in Asia (2015)

-  Colavito - Faking History; Essays on Aliens, Atlantis, Monsters & More (2013)

-  Davis - A Nation Rising; Untold Tales of Flawed Founders, Fallen Heroes, and Forgotten Fighters from America's Hidden History (2010)

-  du Quenoy (Ed.) - History in Dispute, Vol. 16; 20th-Century European Social and Political Movements (2004)

-  du Quenoy (Ed.) - History in Dispute; Vol. 17; 20th-Century European Social and Political Movements, 2nd Series (2004)

-  Dunbar-Ortiz - An Indigenous Peoples' History of the United States (2014)

-  Fellman - Views from the Dark Side of American History (2011)

-  Fisher - Bill O'Reilly's Legends & Lies; the Real West (2015)

-  Flynn - The Great War; 10 Contested Questions (2015)

-  Gaddis - The Landscape of History; How Historians Map the Past (2002)

-  Hamer - The Falsification of History; Our Distorted Reality (2012)

-  Hampson - A Social History of the French Revolution (1963)

-  Hazan - A People's History of the French Revolution (2012)

-  Lehrburger - Secrets of Ancient America; Archaeoastronomy and the Legacy of the Phoenicians, Celts, and Other Forgotten Explorers (2015)

-  MacMillan - Dangerous Games; the Uses and Abuses of History (2009)

-  Marriott - Bad History; How We Got the Past Wrong (2011)

-  May - The Secrets of History (2014)

-  Menzies - 1421; the Year China Discovered the World (2003)

-  Moreau - School Book Nation; Conflicts over American History Textbooks from the Civil War to the Present (2003)

-  Munslow - A History of History (2012)

-  Rain - Mystery of America; Enigmatic Mysteries and Anomalous Artifacts of North America; a Connection to the Ancient Past (2003)

-  Schoenman - The Hidden History of Zionism (1988)

-  Szejnmann (Ed.) - Rethinking History, Dictatorship and War; New Approaches and Interpretations (2009)

-  Tachett - The Coming of the Terror in French Revolution (2015)

-  Thompson  - The Voice of the Past; Oral History, 3e (2000)

-  Vansina - Oral Tradition as History (1930)

-  Windschuttle - The Killing of History; How Literacy Critics and Social Theorists Are Murdering Our Past (1996)

-  Zinn - The Politics of History (1970)
